move.name: Pound
move.description: The foe is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

move.name: Karate Chop
move.description: The foe is attacked with a sharp chop. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: DoubleSlap
move.description: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

move.name: Comet Punch
move.description: The foe is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

move.name: Mega Punch
move.description: The foe is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

move.name: Pay Day
move.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle.

move.name: Fire Punch
move.description: The foe is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the target with a burn.

move.name: Ice Punch
move.description: The foe is punched with an icy fist. It may leave the target frozen.

move.name: ThunderPunch
move.description: The foe is punched with an electrified fist. It may leave the target with paralysis.

move.name: Scratch
move.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the foe to inflict damage.

move.name: ViceGrip
move.description: Huge, impressive pincers grip and squeeze the foe.

move.name: Guillotine
move.description: A vicious, tearing attack with pincers. The foe will faint instantly if this attack hits.

move.name: Razor Wind
move.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit the foe on the second turn. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Swords Dance
move.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

move.name: Cut
move.description: The foe is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.

move.name: Gust
move.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.

move.name: Wing Attack
move.description: The foe is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

move.name: Whirlwind
move.description: The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

move.name: Fly
move.description: The user soars, then strikes on the second turn. It can also be used for flying to any familiar town.

move.name: Bind
move.description: A long body or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the foe for two to five turns.

move.name: Slam
move.description: The foe is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

move.name: Vine Whip
move.description: The foe is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

move.name: Stomp
move.description: The foe is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Double Kick
move.description: The foe is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

move.name: Mega Kick
move.description: The foe is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

move.name: Jump Kick
move.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

move.name: Rolling Kick
move.description: The user cuts a quick spin and lashes out with a sharp kick.

move.name: Sand-Attack
move.description: Sand is hurled in the foe’s face, reducing its accuracy.

move.name: Headbutt
move.description: The user sticks its head out and rams straight forward. It may make the foe flinch.

move.name: Horn Attack
move.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

move.name: Fury Attack
move.description: The foe is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

move.name: Horn Drill
move.description: The foe is stabbed with a horn rotating like a drill. The foe instantly faints if it hits.

move.name: Tackle
move.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the foe with its whole body.

move.name: Body Slam
move.description: The user drops onto the foe with its full body weight. It may leave the foe paralyzed.

move.name: Wrap
move.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the foe for two to five turns.

move.name: Take Down
move.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user a little.

move.name: Thrash
move.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

move.name: Double-Edge
move.description: A reckless, life- risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

move.name: Tail Whip
move.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making the foe less wary. The target’s Defense stat is lowered.

move.name: Poison Sting
move.description: The foe is stabbed with a poisonous barb of some sort. It may also poison the target.

move.name: Twineedle
move.description: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.

move.name: Pin Missile
move.description: Sharp pins are shot at the foe in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

move.name: Leer
move.description: The foe is given an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The target’s Defense stat is reduced.

move.name: Bite
move.description: The foe is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

move.name: Growl
move.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the foe less wary. The target’s Attack stat is lowered.

move.name: Roar
move.description: The foe is scared off, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

move.name: Sing
move.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the foe into a deep slumber.

move.name: Supersonic
move.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

move.name: SonicBoom
move.description: The foe is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

move.name: Disable
move.description: For several turns, this move prevents the foe from using the move it last used.

move.name: Acid
move.description: The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

move.name: Ember
move.description: The foe is attacked with small flames. The target may also be left with a burn.

move.name: Flamethrower
move.description: The foe is scorched with an intense blast of fire. The target may also be left with a burn.

move.name: Mist
move.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

move.name: Water Gun
move.description: The foe is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

move.name: Hydro Pump
move.description: The foe is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

move.name: Surf
move.description: It swamps the entire battlefield with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.

move.name: Ice Beam
move.description: The foe is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

move.name: Blizzard
move.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the foe. It may also freeze the target solid.

move.name: Psybeam
move.description: The foe is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also leave the target confused.

move.name: BubbleBeam
move.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

move.name: Aurora Beam
move.description: The foe is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. It may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

move.name: Hyper Beam
move.description: The foe is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

move.name: Peck
move.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

move.name: Drill Peck
move.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

move.name: Submission
move.description: The user grabs the foe and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.

move.name: Low Kick
move.description: A powerful low kick that makes the foe fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier foes.

move.name: Counter
move.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

move.name: Seismic Toss
move.description: The foe is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

move.name: Strength
move.description: The foe is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. It can also be used to move boulders.

move.name: Absorb
move.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

move.name: Mega Drain
move.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

move.name: Leech Seed
move.description: A seed is planted on the foe. It steals some HP from the foe to heal the user on every turn.

move.name: Growth
move.description: The user’s body is forced to grow all at once. It raises the Sp. Atk stat.

move.name: Razor Leaf
move.description: A sharp-edged leaf is launched to slash at the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: SolarBeam
move.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

move.name: PoisonPowder
move.description: A cloud of poisonous dust is scattered on the foe. It may poison the target.

move.name: Stun Spore
move.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may paralyze the target.

move.name: Sleep Powder
move.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep- inducing dust around the foe.

move.name: Petal Dance
move.description: The user attacks by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

move.name: String Shot
move.description: The foe is bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth. It reduces the target’s Speed stat.

move.name: Dragon Rage
move.description: The foe is stricken by a shock wave. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

move.name: Fire Spin
move.description: The foe becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for two to five turns.

move.name: ThunderShock
move.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.

move.name: Thunderbolt
move.description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the foe. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.

move.name: Thunder Wave
move.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the foe. It causes paralysis if it hits.

move.name: Thunder
move.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

move.name: Rock Throw
move.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the foe to attack.

move.name: Earthquake
move.description: The user sets off an earthquake that hits all the Pokémon in the battle.

move.name: Fissure
move.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the foe in. The target instantly faints if it hits.

move.name: Dig
move.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

move.name: Toxic
move.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

move.name: Confusion
move.description: The foe is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the foe confused.

move.name: Psychic
move.description: The foe is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

move.name: Hypnosis
move.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

move.name: Meditate
move.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

move.name: Agility
move.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

move.name: Quick Attack
move.description: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

move.name: Rage
move.description: While this move is in use, it gains attack power each time the user is hit in battle.

move.name: Teleport
move.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It may also be used to warp to the last Poké Center visited.

move.name: Night Shade
move.description: The user makes the foe see a mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user’s level.

move.name: Mimic
move.description: The user copies the move last used by the foe. The move can be used for the rest of the battle.

move.name: Screech
move.description: An earsplitting screech is emitted to sharply reduce the foe’s Defense stat.

move.name: Double Team
move.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

move.name: Recover
move.description: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

move.name: Harden
move.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

move.name: Minimize
move.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller. The user’s evasion stat is boosted.

move.name: SmokeScreen
move.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the foe’s accuracy.

move.name: Confuse Ray
move.description: The foe is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

move.name: Withdraw
move.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

move.name: Defense Curl
move.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

move.name: Barrier
move.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

move.name: Light Screen
move.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

move.name: Haze
move.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

move.name: Reflect
move.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

move.name: Focus Energy
move.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise the critical-hit ratio of its attacks.

move.name: Bide
move.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

move.name: Metronome
move.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates the brain into randomly using nearly any move.

move.name: Mirror Move
move.description: The user counters the foe by mimicking the move last used by the foe.

move.name: Selfdestruct
move.description: The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

move.name: Egg Bomb
move.description: A large egg is hurled with maximum force at the foe to inflict damage.

move.name: Lick
move.description: The foe is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also paralyze the target.

move.name: Smog
move.description: The foe is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

move.name: Sludge
move.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the foe. It may also poison the target.

move.name: Bone Club
move.description: The user clubs the foe with a bone. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Fire Blast
move.description: The foe is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

move.name: Waterfall
move.description: The user charges the foe at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

move.name: Clamp
move.description: The foe is clamped and squeezed by the user’s very thick and sturdy shell for two to five turns.

move.name: Swift
move.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the foe. This attack never misses.

move.name: Skull Bash
move.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the foe on the next turn.

move.name: Spike Cannon
move.description: Sharp spikes are fired at the foe to strike two to five times in rapid succession.

move.name: Constrict
move.description: The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed.

move.name: Amnesia
move.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

move.name: Kinesis
move.description: The user distracts the foe by bending a spoon. It may lower the target’s accuracy.

move.name: Softboiled
move.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP. May be used in the field to heal HP.

move.name: Hi Jump Kick
move.description: The foe is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

move.name: Glare
move.description: The user intimidates the foe with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

move.name: Dream Eater
move.description: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.

move.name: Poison Gas
move.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the foe’s face. It may poison the target.

move.name: Barrage
move.description: Round objects are hurled at the foe to strike two to five times in a row.

move.name: Leech Life
move.description: A blood-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

move.name: Lovely Kiss
move.description: With a scary face, the user forces a kiss on the foe. It may make the target fall asleep.

move.name: Sky Attack
move.description: A second-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Transform
move.description: The user transforms into a copy of the foe right down to having the same move set.

move.name: Bubble
move.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

move.name: Dizzy Punch
move.description: The foe is hit with a rhythmically launched punch that may also leave it confused.

move.name: Spore
move.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

move.name: Flash
move.description: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

move.name: Psywave
move.description: The foe is attacked with an odd, hot energy wave. The attack varies in intensity.

move.name: Splash
move.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

move.name: Acid Armor
move.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

move.name: Crabhammer
move.description: The foe is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Explosion
move.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

move.name: Fury Swipes
move.description: The foe is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

move.name: Bonemerang
move.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the foe twice, coming and going.

move.name: Rest
move.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status problem.

move.name: Rock Slide
move.description: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Hyper Fang
move.description: The user bites hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Sharpen
move.description: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

move.name: Conversion
move.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.

move.name: Tri Attack
move.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three- beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.

move.name: Super Fang
move.description: The user chomps hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target’s HP to half.

move.name: Slash
move.description: The foe is attacked with a slash of claws, etc. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Substitute
move.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

move.name: Struggle
move.description: An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also hurts the user slightly.

move.name: Sketch
move.description: It enables the user to learn a move used by the foe. Once used, the move Sketch disappears.

move.name: Triple Kick
move.description: A consecutive three- kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

move.name: Thief
move.description: The user attacks and steals the foe’s held item simultaneously. It can’t steal if the user holds an item.

move.name: Spider Web
move.description: The user ensnares the foe with a thin, gooey silk so it can’t flee from battle.

move.name: Mind Reader
move.description: The user senses the foe’s movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss.

move.name: Nightmare
move.description: A sleeping foe is shown a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

move.name: Flame Wheel
move.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. It may also leave the target with a burn.

move.name: Snore
move.description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the foe flinch.

move.name: Curse
move.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all the other types.

move.name: Flail
move.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

move.name: Conversion 2
move.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack it last took.

move.name: Aeroblast
move.description: A vortex of air is shot at the foe to inflict damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Cotton Spore
move.description: The user releases cottonlike spores that cling to the foe, sharply reducing its Speed stat.

move.name: Reversal
move.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

move.name: Spite
move.description: The user looses its grudge on the move last used by the foe by cutting 4 PP from it.

move.name: Powder Snow
move.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the target.

move.name: Protect
move.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

move.name: Mach Punch
move.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

move.name: Scary Face
move.description: The user frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed stat.

move.name: Faint Attack
move.description: The user draws up to the foe disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

move.name: Sweet Kiss
move.description: The user kisses the foe with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

move.name: Belly Drum
move.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

move.name: Sludge Bomb
move.description: The user attacks by hurling filthy sludge at the foe. It may also poison the target.

move.name: Mud-Slap
move.description: The user hurls mud in the foe’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

move.name: Octazooka
move.description: The user attacks by spraying ink in the foe’s face or eyes. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

move.name: Spikes
move.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the foe’s feet. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

move.name: Zap Cannon
move.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

move.name: Foresight
move.description: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

move.name: Destiny Bond
move.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the foe that landed the knockout hit also faints.

move.name: Perish Song
move.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns unless it switches out of battle.

move.name: Icy Wind
move.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

move.name: Detect
move.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

move.name: Bone Rush
move.description: The user strikes at the foe with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

move.name: Lock-On
move.description: The user takes sure aim at the foe. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target.

move.name: Outrage
move.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. However, it then becomes confused.

move.name: Sandstorm
move.description: A five-turn sand- storm is summoned to hurt all combatant types except Rock, Ground, and Steel.

move.name: Giga Drain
move.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

move.name: Endure
move.description: The user endures any attack, leaving 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

move.name: Charm
move.description: The user charmingly stares at the foe, making it less wary. The target’s Attack is sharply lowered.

move.name: Rollout
move.description: The user continually rolls into the foe over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

move.name: False Swipe
move.description: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

move.name: Swagger
move.description: The user enrages the foe into confusion. However, it also sharply raises the foe’s Attack stat.

move.name: Milk Drink
move.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.

move.name: Spark
move.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the foe. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

move.name: Fury Cutter
move.description: The foe is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

move.name: Steel Wing
move.description: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

move.name: Mean Look
move.description: The user affixes the foe with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

move.name: Attract
move.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

move.name: Sleep Talk
move.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

move.name: Heal Bell
move.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.

move.name: Return
move.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

move.name: Present
move.description: The user attacks by giving the foe a booby-trapped gift. It restores HP sometimes, however.

move.name: Frustration
move.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

move.name: Safeguard
move.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

move.name: Pain Split
move.description: The user adds its HP to the foe’s HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the foe.

move.name: Sacred Fire
move.description: The foe is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn.

move.name: Magnitude
move.description: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone in battle. Its power varies.

move.name: DynamicPunch
move.description: The foe is punched with the user’s full, concentrated power. It confuses the foe if it hits.

move.name: Megahorn
move.description: Utilizing its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the foe with no letup.

move.name: DragonBreath
move.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also paralyze the target.

move.name: Baton Pass
move.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

move.name: Encore
move.description: The user compels the foe to keep using only the move it last used for two to six turns.

move.name: Pursuit
move.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a foe that is switching out of battle.

move.name: Rapid Spin
move.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

move.name: Sweet Scent
move.description: A sweet scent that lowers the foe’s evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

move.name: Iron Tail
move.description: The foe is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

move.name: Metal Claw
move.description: The foe is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

move.name: Vital Throw
move.description: The user allows the foe to attack first. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

move.name: Morning Sun
move.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

move.name: Synthesis
move.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

move.name: Moonlight
move.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

move.name: Hidden Power
move.description: A unique attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the Pokémon using it.

move.name: Cross Chop
move.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Twister
move.description: The user whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe. It may also make the foe flinch.

move.name: Rain Dance
move.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water- type moves.

move.name: Sunny Day
move.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

move.name: Crunch
move.description: The user crunches up the foe with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

move.name: Mirror Coat
move.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

move.name: Psych Up
move.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.

move.name: ExtremeSpeed
move.description: The user charges the foe at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

move.name: AncientPower
move.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

move.name: Shadow Ball
move.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

move.name: Future Sight
move.description: Two turns after this move is used, the foe is attacked with a hunk of psychic energy.

move.name: Rock Smash
move.description: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.

move.name: Whirlpool
move.description: The user traps the foe inside a fast, vicious whirlpool that lasts for two to five turns.

move.name: Beat Up
move.description: The user gets all the party Pokémon to attack the foe. The more party Pokémon, the more damage.

move.name: Fake Out
move.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. This move works only on the first turn.

move.name: Uproar
move.description: The user attacks in an uproar for two to five turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

move.name: Stockpile
move.description: The user charges up power, and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

move.name: Spit Up
move.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack.

move.name: Swallow
move.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP.

move.name: Heat Wave
move.description: The user exhales a heated breath on the foe to attack. It may also leave the target with a burn.

move.name: Hail
move.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

move.name: Torment
move.description: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

move.name: Flatter
move.description: Flattery is used to confuse the foe. However, it also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

move.name: Will-O-Wisp
move.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the foe to inflict a burn.

move.name: Memento
move.description: The user faints upon using this move. In return, it sharply lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk.

move.name: Facade
move.description: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, paralyzed, or has a burn.

move.name: Focus Punch
move.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

move.name: SmellingSalt
move.description: This attack inflicts double damage on a paralyzed foe. It also cures the foe’s paralysis, however.

move.name: Follow Me
move.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all foes take aim only at the user.

move.name: Nature Power
move.description: An attack that makes use of nature’s power. Its effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

move.name: Charge
move.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses next. It also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

move.name: Taunt
move.description: The foe is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for two to four turns.

move.name: Helping Hand
move.description: A move that boosts the power of the ally’s attack in a Double Battle.

move.name: Trick
move.description: The user catches the foe off guard and swaps the foe’s held item with its own.

move.name: Role Play
move.description: The user mimics the foe completely, copying the foe’s natural ability.

move.name: Wish
move.description: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP in the next turn.

move.name: Assist
move.description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party.

move.name: Ingrain
move.description: The user lays roots that restore HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can’t switch out.

move.name: Superpower
move.description: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.

move.name: Magic Coat
move.description: A barrier reflects back to the foe moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

move.name: Recycle
move.description: The user recycles a single-use item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

move.name: Revenge
move.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

move.name: Brick Break
move.description: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

move.name: Yawn
move.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the foe into falling asleep on the next turn.

move.name: Knock Off
move.description: The user slaps down the foe’s held item, preventing the item from being used during the battle.

move.name: Endeavor
move.description: An attack move that cuts down the foe’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

move.name: Eruption
move.description: The user attacks in an explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.

move.name: Skill Swap
move.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.

move.name: Imprison
move.description: If the foe knows any move also known by the user, the foe is prevented from using it.

move.name: Refresh
move.description: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

move.name: Grudge
move.description: If the user faints, the user’s grudge fully depletes the PP of the foe’s move that knocked it out.

move.name: Snatch
move.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or status- changing move the foe attempts to use.

move.name: Secret Power
move.description: The user attacks with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

move.name: Dive
move.description: A two-turn attack. The user dives underwater on the first turn, then hits on the next turn.

move.name: Arm Thrust
move.description: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

move.name: Camouflage
move.description: The user’s type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in a cave.

move.name: Tail Glow
move.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, sharply raising its Sp. Atk stat.

move.name: Luster Purge
move.description: The user looses a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target’s Sp. Def stat.

move.name: Mist Ball
move.description: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk.

move.name: FeatherDance
move.description: The user covers the foe with a mass of down that sharply lowers the Attack stat.

move.name: Teeter Dance
move.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses all the Pokémon in battle.

move.name: Blaze Kick
move.description: The user launches a kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also leave the target with a burn.

move.name: Mud Sport
move.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric- type moves while the user is in the battle.

move.name: Ice Ball
move.description: The user continually rolls into the foe over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

move.name: Needle Arm
move.description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Slack Off
move.description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

move.name: Hyper Voice
move.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

move.name: Poison Fang
move.description: The user bites the foe with toxic fangs. It may also leave the foe badly poisoned.

move.name: Crush Claw
move.description: The user slashes the foe with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target’s Defense.

move.name: Blast Burn
move.description: The foe is razed by a fiery explosion. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

move.name: Hydro Cannon
move.description: The foe is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

move.name: Meteor Mash
move.description: The foe is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user’s Attack.

move.name: Astonish
move.description: The user attacks the foe while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Weather Ball
move.description: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.

move.name: Aromatherapy
move.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user’s party.

move.name: Fake Tears
move.description: The user feigns crying to make the foe feel flustered, sharply lowering its Sp. Def stat.

move.name: Air Cutter
move.description: The user launches razorlike wind to slash the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Overheat
move.description: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

move.name: Odor Sleuth
move.description: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

move.name: Rock Tomb
move.description: Boulders are hurled at the foe. It also lowers the foe’s Speed by preventing its movement.

move.name: Silver Wind
move.description: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.

move.name: Metal Sound
move.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal is emitted to sharply reduce the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

move.name: GrassWhistle
move.description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the foe into a deep sleep.

move.name: Tickle
move.description: The user tickles the foe into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

move.name: Cosmic Power
move.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

move.name: Water Spout
move.description: The user spouts water to damage the foe. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful it becomes.

move.name: Signal Beam
move.description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.

move.name: Shadow Punch
move.description: The user throws a punch at the foe from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.

move.name: Extrasensory
move.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the foe flinch.

move.name: Sky Uppercut
move.description: The user attacks the foe with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

move.name: Sand Tomb
move.description: The user traps the foe inside a harshly raging sandstorm for two to five turns.

move.name: Sheer Cold
move.description: The foe is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The foe instantly faints if it hits.

move.name: Muddy Water
move.description: The user attacks by shooting out muddy water. It may also lower the foe’s accuracy.

move.name: Bullet Seed
move.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

move.name: Aerial Ace
move.description: The user confounds the foe with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

move.name: Icicle Spear
move.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the foe. It strikes two to five times in a row.

move.name: Iron Defense
move.description: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

move.name: Block
move.description: The user blocks the foe’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

move.name: Howl
move.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

move.name: Dragon Claw
move.description: The user slashes the foe with huge, sharp claws.

move.name: Frenzy Plant
move.description: The foe is slammed with an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.

move.name: Bulk Up
move.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.

move.name: Bounce
move.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the foe on the second turn. It may also paralyze the foe.

move.name: Mud Shot
move.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the foe. It also reduces the target’s Speed.

move.name: Poison Tail
move.description: An attack with a high critical-hit ratio. This tail attack may also poison the foe.

move.name: Covet
move.description: The user endearingly approaches the foe, then steals the item the foe is holding.

move.name: Volt Tackle
move.description: The user electrifies itself, then charges at the foe. It causes considerable damage to the user as well.

move.name: Magical Leaf
move.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the foe. This attack will not miss.

move.name: Water Sport
move.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

move.name: Calm Mind
move.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

move.name: Leaf Blade
move.description: The foe is slashed with a sharp leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Dragon Dance
move.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

move.name: Rock Blast
move.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the foe. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

move.name: Shock Wave
move.description: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

move.name: Water Pulse
move.description: The user attacks the foe with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe.

move.name: Doom Desire
move.description: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the foe with a concentrated bundle of light.

move.name: Psycho Boost
move.description: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

move.name: Roost
move.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

move.name: Gravity
move.description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitation.

move.name: Miracle Eye
move.description: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

move.name: Wake-Up Slap
move.description: This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however.

move.name: Hammer Arm
move.description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

move.name: Gyro Ball
move.description: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

move.name: Healing Wish
move.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

move.name: Brine
move.description: If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

move.name: Natural Gift
move.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

move.name: Feint
move.description: An attack that hits a foe using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

move.name: Pluck
move.description: The user pecks the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.

move.name: Tailwind
move.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for three turns.

move.name: Acupressure
move.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

move.name: Metal Burst
move.description: The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power.

move.name: U-turn
move.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

move.name: Close Combat
move.description: The user fights the foe in close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user’s Defense and Sp. Def.

move.name: Payback
move.description: If the user can use this attack after the foe attacks, its power is doubled.

move.name: Assurance
move.description: If the foe has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

move.name: Embargo
move.description: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

move.name: Fling
move.description: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

move.name: Psycho Shift
move.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

move.name: Trump Card
move.description: The fewer PP this move has, the more power it has for attack.

move.name: Heal Block
move.description: The user prevents the foe from using any HP-recovery moves for five turns.

move.name: Wring Out
move.description: The user powerfully wrings the foe. The more HP the foe has, the greater this attack’s power.

move.name: Power Trick
move.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

move.name: Gastro Acid
move.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid eliminates the effect of the foe’s ability.

move.name: Lucky Chant
move.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing the foe from landing critical hits.

move.name: Me First
move.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the foe to steal and use the foe’s intended move with greater power.

move.name: Copycat
move.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

move.name: Power Swap
move.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the foe.

move.name: Guard Swap
move.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.

move.name: Punishment
move.description: This attack’s power increases the more the foe has powered up with stat changes.

move.name: Last Resort
move.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

move.name: Worry Seed
move.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.

move.name: Sucker Punch
move.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.

move.name: Toxic Spikes
move.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the foe’s feet. They poison foes that switch into battle.

move.name: Heart Swap
move.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the foe.

move.name: Aqua Ring
move.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

move.name: Magnet Rise
move.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

move.name: Flare Blitz
move.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. The user sustains serious damage, too.

move.name: Force Palm
move.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

move.name: Aura Sphere
move.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move is certain to hit.

move.name: Rock Polish
move.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

move.name: Poison Jab
move.description: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the foe.

move.name: Dark Pulse
move.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Night Slash
move.description: The user slashes the foe the instant an opportunity arises. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Aqua Tail
move.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

move.name: Seed Bomb
move.description: The user slams a barrage of hard- shelled seeds down on the foe from above.

move.name: Air Slash
move.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: X-Scissor
move.description: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

move.name: Bug Buzz
move.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

move.name: Dragon Pulse
move.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

move.name: Dragon Rush
move.description: The user tackles the foe while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Power Gem
move.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

move.name: Drain Punch
move.description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

move.name: Vacuum Wave
move.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.

move.name: Focus Blast
move.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

move.name: Energy Ball
move.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

move.name: Brave Bird
move.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

move.name: Earth Power
move.description: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

move.name: Switcheroo
move.description: The user trades held items with the foe faster than the eye can follow.

move.name: Giga Impact
move.description: The user charges at the foe using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

move.name: Nasty Plot
move.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

move.name: Bullet Punch
move.description: The user strikes with a tough punch as fast as a bullet. This move always goes first.

move.name: Avalanche
move.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

move.name: Ice Shard
move.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them. This move always goes first.

move.name: Shadow Claw
move.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Thunder Fang
move.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or become paralyzed.

move.name: Ice Fang
move.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or freeze.

move.name: Fire Fang
move.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or sustain a burn.

move.name: Shadow Sneak
move.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the foe from behind. This move always goes first.

move.name: Mud Bomb
move.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

move.name: Psycho Cut
move.description: The user tears at the foe with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Zen Headbutt
move.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and rams the foe. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Mirror Shot
move.description: The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

move.name: Flash Cannon
move.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

move.name: Rock Climb
move.description: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.

move.name: Defog
move.description: Obstacles are moved, reducing the foe’s evasion stat. It can also be used to clear deep fog, etc.

move.name: Trick Room
move.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

move.name: Draco Meteor
move.description: Comets are summoned down from the sky. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

move.name: Discharge
move.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike all Pokémon in battle. It may also cause paralysis.

move.name: Lava Plume
move.description: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all Pokémon in battle. It may also inflict burns.

move.name: Leaf Storm
move.description: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

move.name: Power Whip
move.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the foe.

move.name: Rock Wrecker
move.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

move.name: Cross Poison
move.description: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Gunk Shot
move.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.

move.name: Iron Head
move.description: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

move.name: Magnet Bomb
move.description: The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss.

move.name: Stone Edge
move.description: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Captivate
move.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

move.name: Stealth Rock
move.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

move.name: Grass Knot
move.description: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.

move.name: Chatter
move.description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe.

move.name: Judgment
move.description: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

move.name: Bug Bite
move.description: The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

move.name: Charge Beam
move.description: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

move.name: Wood Hammer
move.description: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

move.name: Aqua Jet
move.description: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

move.name: Attack Order
move.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Defend Order
move.description: The user calls out its underlings to make a living shield, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

move.name: Heal Order
move.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

move.name: Head Smash
move.description: The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.

move.name: Double Hit
move.description: The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.

move.name: Roar of Time
move.description: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

move.name: Spacial Rend
move.description: The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

move.name: Lunar Dance
move.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

move.name: Crush Grip
move.description: The foe is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the foe has left.

move.name: Magma Storm
move.description: The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns.

move.name: Dark Void
move.description: The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.

move.name: Seed Flare
move.description: The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

move.name: Ominous Wind
move.description: The user creates a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

move.name: Shadow Force
move.description: The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe used Protect.
